rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports export drop percentages factually without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment discusses export drops (financial/trade metrics), which are treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports export drops but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes past export drops, not capabilities or preparedness.
